name: ITP 4 - Set Out - Penetrations & Fire Collars
Survey & Set Out Works
Take dimensions off drawings and record any remarks / deviations prior to installing
Set Out
Photo of title block to include drawing number & revision
Structural Interface
Consult structural drawings to ensure no structural effect with penetration or cast in position
Ensure pipework within set downs and beams are cast in/out of set downs where required and indicated on penetration drawings
Check that penetration does not clash with elements downstairs e.g. Walls, Beams ETC
Fire Collar Installation
Ensure that fire collar is installed as per manufacturer's specifications and is spatially acceptable
Fire Collar Type
Pipe Insertion to Collars
Ensure pipe is fitted correctly
Ensure pipe is fitted to maximise the efficiency of the next sequence of work e.g. Pipe is easy to knock through
Cast in Conduits
Ensure conduit is within wall or carcass range
Use 15/45 degree bends on all changes in direction
Cast in Balcony Outlets
Ensure pipe is supported correctly without affecting balcony soffit
Ensure pipes are not damaged after top steel and set downs are installed.
Safewaste or Puddle Flange Installation
Ensure safewaste or puddle flange is installed to all required outlets
Ensure safewaste or puddle flange is installed to the correct height
Spray all floor wastes to identify falls
All Pipes & Casting Capped & Supported
Ensure no open ends by installing dust cap or duct tape on risers
Pipe Sleeves
Ensure all sleeves installed in in situ walls at the correct height
Castin Downpipes
Ensure pipes are clear of any obstructions prior to extending riser
Ensure pipe is fitted correctly where agreed by structural engineer
Ensure pipes are wrapped where required
Ensure downpipes capped and taped to riser
Ensure pipe is filled with water for concrete pour where required
Inspect Pipework
Complete all required inspections by third parties (client, authorities, builder, etc)
Work verified by Scentre Group
Photos
Ensure photos are taken of entire installation inc fire collars and casting prior to concrete pour
Works verified as conforming (McPherson Plumbing Representative) Name:
